messages.content: What does ComfyUIInvisibleWatermark add to an image?
ComfyUIInvisibleWatermark adds up to 12 characters encoded into an image
Can the encoded image exhibit visible degradation after the watermark is applied?
No, the output is an encoded image with no visible degradation
What does the Apply Invisible Watermark node do?
The Apply Invisible Watermark node takes in an image and a 12 character maximum keyword to be encoded into the image, and outputs the encoded image
What does the Extract Watermark node do?
The Extract Watermark node takes in an image and determines if there's a hidden watermark, and will output a string if it exists
Is there a limit to the number of characters that can be encoded into an image using ComfyUIInvisibleWatermark?
Yes, there is a 12 character maximum limit for the keyword to be encoded into the image
